NPC.name: elder thing
NPC.description: the loathsome dweller in this dank place moves with a hideous lurching half gait half slithering motion. Its skin hanging rugose and loose between bruise purple stiffened and bulbous masses that bring to mind cancerous growths. Its wet and questing tentacles twitch and waver, flicking outwards as if tasteing the air as like tongues. Fitting then for the way they protrude from its mouth, but as it turns towards you dozens of eyes regard you with callous calculation, no beast this beastial creature for you glimpse in those eyes a mind as ancient as it is cool and unsympathetic.

missText.text: The elder thing flails its tentacles at TARGET
TARGET evades the elder things tentacles

hitText.text: The elder thing lashes TARGET for VALUE damage

missText.text: The elder thing attempts to assail the mind of TARGET

hitText.text: TARGET loses VALUE resolve as the elder thing attempts to exert its most terrible will upon them
